original_text: If you offer the first piece of bread to God, then all the bread will belong to God. If the roots of a tree belong to God, then the branches will also be his. If you offer the first piece of bread to God, then all the bread will belong to God. If the roots of a tree belong to God, then the branches will also be his.
korean_text: 제사하는 처음 익은 곡식 가루가 거룩한즉 떡덩이도 그러하고 뿌리가 거룩한즉 가지도 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: If you offer the first piece of bread to God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 하나님께 첫 번째 빵 조각을 드리면

sentences.original_text: then all the bread will belong to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 모든 빵이 하나님께 속할 것이다

sentences.original_text: If the roots of a tree belong to God
then the branches will also be his
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 가지들도 그의 것이 될 것이다
